message.body: Hi Sam~ How are you doing? Finals all wrapped up now?
I'm fine! How have you been?
Busy, but going well. I've been apartment hunting in the morning before work for the past two weeks or so.
Oh cool. Did you see any you liked?

I'm considering 2 so far. The last two showings I scheduled are tomorrow, and then I should be decided.
Turned in my official uh...request to not renew my lease to my landlord today too.
What have you been up to?
Ace that final project?

Ahh okay then. Well I hope you find one that suits you and is in a safer neighborhood! I did do well on the finals thank goodness! Now I'm starting an online course. Not much happening. I'm working on sending out a bunch of job applic
ations again.
Are you looking for full time positions now?
Yeah, I need to. I still want to continue with my education but I feel like the longer I spend only doing part time teaching, the harder it will be to ad
just to that work schedule. Plus, if I don't get the experience, I'll lose half of the skills I'm learning! Also, my mom is still unemployed and I need t
o keep helping her as much as I can.

Yeah, I remember you said that your mom was losing her job. Hopefully you can find a position in time for the new year.
Maybe you can get into McCall?
They would have to have an opening. Plus, with public schools, you can't apply directly to a school. You send the department of eduction your application
and they give you a list of "suggested schools" to interview with based on your credentials.
In short, they are fartknockers. :p
Eloquent, lol. So where are you applying? Just schools in the Philadelphia area?
A bunch of charter and catholic schools for now. Then when I get all the paperwork back from the state, I'll try the public schools again.
Aha. I'd be a nice commute if you got into St. Nick's.
It'd.
Not me
Hehehe just roll out of bed and go to school :)
That's when you know you've got the good life~
:D just got done voting. The PA governor primary elections are today
Yay~ Maryland's is next June.
Err, next month.
Which is June.
You know what I mean!
Hehe, I do. Well make sure you exercise your democratic rights. Also, the ban against same-sex marriage in PA was declared unconstitutional! I'm so happy
I'm gonna cry!
That's awesome. I'm glad it finally got through.
:D
Sam, come to Baltimore and be my roommate ;;
